name: Selenium
Relationship: Incompatible: CHINA; WINE.Compare: AGNUS; CALAD.; SULPHUR; TELLUR.; PHOS. ACID.Antidotes: IGN.; PULS.

Head: Hair falls out
PAIN OVER LEFT EYE; WORSE, WALKING IN SUN, STRONG ODORS AND TEA
Scalp feels tense
Headache from tea drinking
Stomach: Desire for brandy and other strong drink
After eating, pulsation all over, especially abdomen
Abdomen: Chronic liver affections; liver painful, ENLARGED, WITH FINE RASH OVER LIVER REGION
Stool constipated, hard and accumulated in rectum
Sensation in the tip of urethra as if a biting drop were forcing its way out
Skin: Dry, scaly eruption in palms, with itching
ITCHING ABOUT THE ANKLES and folds of skin, between fingers
Hair falls out from brows, beard, and genitals
Itching about finger-joints and between fingers; in palms
Seborrhoea oleos; comedones WITH AN OILY SURFACE OF THE SKIN; alopecia
Throat: Hawking and raising transparent lumps of mucus every morning
Cough in morning, with expectoration of bloody mucus
Extremities: Paralytic pains in small of back in the morning
Tearing pain in hands, at night
SLEEP PREVENTED BY PULSATION IN ALL VESSELS, worse abdomen
Sleepless until midnight, awakens early and always same hour
Male: LOSS OF SEXUAL POWER, with lascivious fancies

details: Selenium is a constant constituent of bones and teeth.Marked effects on the genitourinary organs, and often indicated in elderly men, especially for prostration and sexual atony. GREAT DEBILITY; worse, heat. Easy exhaustion, mental and physical, in old age. Debility after exhausting diseases.
dosage: Sixth to thirtieth potency. Colloidal Selenium injection for inoperable cancer. Pain, sleeplessness, ulceration and discharge are markedly diminished.
